abstract: Despite an awkward moment when he said $3.45 a gallon was a "good price" for gas -- a sentiment not shared by the questioner -- Mitt Romney was welcomed at a town hall meeting in Manchester.
snippet: Despite an awkward moment when he said $3.45 a gallon was a "good price" for gas -- a sentiment not shared by the questioner -- Mitt Romney was welcomed at a town hall meeting in Manchester.

headline.main: Romney Fields Friendly Questions in New Hampshire
